body.name: Hvlgmrc Military Smart Watch for Men 1.93 Inches Outdoor Sports Smartwatch with Answer/Make Call,Fitness Watch,Blood Oxygen,Heart Rate and Sleep Monitor Compatible with iPhone and Android Phones
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 34 mins
features: 【Durable Military-grade Construction】The Smart Watch is made from a special aluminum alloy material, our Military Smart Watch for Men has undergone rigorous military-grade testing, including extreme temperature, low pressure, and dust resistance. This watch can withstand harsh environmental conditions, making it the perfect companion for outdoor adventures.

【Convenient Call and Message Functions】Stay connected on the go with our Military Smart Watch for Men. With the ability to make and answer calls, you can stay connected wherever you go. The call and text capabilities allow you to stay in touch with friends, family, and colleagues at all times. It also seamlessly integrates with popular social media platforms such as Facebook, WhatsApp, and Twitter. Receive notifications directly on your wrist.

【Comprehensive Health Monitoring】Monitor your heart rate, blood oxygen levels, and sleep patterns to achieve a holistic understanding of your overall health and well-being. Sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder functions and stress testing prompt you to remain active and stay hydrated throughout the day, maintaining your peak performance levels.

【Multi-Sport Modes and Fitness Tracking】With its step, distance, and calorie burned tracking capabilities, this smart watch provides real-time data to help you monitor your daily exercise routine. Whether you're walking, running, playing basketball, football, cycling, rope skipping, or even mountain climbing, this smart watch has multiple sports modes to cater to your specific workout needs.

【Versatile Functions】The smart watch equipped many other strong functions, such as Ai voice ,weather forecasts, alarm clocks, remote camera , music control, stop watch, find phone, customize your dial, raise hand to brighten the screen,calculator, not-disturb mode and so on. More joy of the watch is waiting for you to explore.

【Wide Compatibility and Large Battery capacity】Smart watch is compatible with most iOS 8.0 and Android 4.4 and later smartphones. Our Military Smart Watch equipped with a large capacity battery, providing long-lasting power for extended outdoor adventures or busy days. Spend more time using your smartwatch and less time worrying about charging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch for the money
reviews.reviewText: This watch was so simple to connect to my phone. It does everything that I wanted it to do. I can change the face of the watch at any time. I can check my heart rate stress level oxygen level. Many things I can do with this watch. I highly suggest it if you want an inexpensive watch that does many things and actually looks nice and is sturdy. I don't think you can go wrong with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value and Quality
reviews.reviewText: This is a great watch loaded with features for an unbeatable price. Style, functionality, and even a 1 year warranty, a true 5 star product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice and easy to setup.
reviews.reviewText: Just set it up. Very easy. I'll be back in a week to fill information on the battery life and durability. I'm tough on my watches. I've got Casios, Timex and a Norther Edge Apache. So, yes I no a bit about durability of watches. I usually get a new watch every year. 01/30/2024 the battery life is very good. I set my watch to off when I raise my arm. No need to have it come on if I'm just doing normal ROM. So, that info could help with your battery longevity. Overall, why pay more for the big names? This watch does it all for a very good price. And if you're as rough on your watches as I am, then it's worth it. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect smart watch, easy to setup
reviews.reviewText: surprised to see so many features, easy setup and looks amazing. need to check on battery life. so far feels great on this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just bought this mainly because my girlfriend and I started walking for exercise. She bought herself an slim activity tracker and was enjoying hers. It made me want one but I wanted something with some more personality then I saw this one. I read the reviews of this and many others and decided to order this. The first thing I noticed was the size of the face easily readable but not tacky. Then I noticed the comfort the band is stretchy making it hardly noticeable that you're wearing it. It makes our long walks even more enjoyable and we complete with our steps etc. I definitely recommend this product if you're looking for an inexpensive way to follow your progress as to aim for better health.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The watch is great. Simple and easy to use, light weight. It's an excellent buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a great smart watch.
reviews.reviewText: It's a great smart watch and every lite weight. I used it for work and it's every comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch and interface
reviews.reviewText: Great watch for price! Interface with Android works very well, limited address book upload, but not really looking for that in this level. All functions like heart rate, blood oxygen, and stress seem accurate at initial setup. Time and real life environment shall tell the endurance and durability. The call and media audio functions are very good ease of use to toggle on and off and calls are crisp and clear on both ends.
